note:
High tech hippie sharing photos & stories from the far out side of the mountain.
"I've learned you can go as far as you want in life, as long as you're willing to sacrifice a bit of comfort. Ask yourself and you will see, you can manifest destiny. Use your mind to create the opportunities you want to experience." These are some of the lessons and moments I was able to pull from. Hoping to share an uplifting joy, as we ride along this wild reality simulation called life.
